pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hierarchical Clustering-Based Portfolio Allocation Strategies // Machine learning portfolio allocation strategies based on hierarchical clustering methods. The implemented methods are: Hierarchical risk parity (De Prado, 2016) DOI: 10.3905/jpm.2016.42.4.059 and Hierarchical clustering-based asset allocation (Raffinot, 2017) DOI: 10.3905/jpm.2018.44.2.089.
